ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. LEONARD S. MANDAMIN, who was required to relocate to the National Capital Region following his appointment as a Judge of the Federal Court on April 27, 2007.
AttachmentsAttachment
